queries.query_description: Ensures clean state by dropping table from any previous failed run

queries.query_string: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS dos_test_table (id INT SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, query_data VARCHAR(255), query_time TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, INDEX idx_query_time (query_time))
queries.query_description: Creates table for Denial of Service testing with indexes

queries.query_string: INSERT INTO dos_test_table (query_data) VALUES (CONCAT('DoS Test Data ', gen_random_uuid()::text))
queries.query_description: Insert 10000 initial records for DoS testing

queries.query_string: SELECT COUNT(*), AVG(id), MAX(id), MIN(id) FROM dos_test_table WHERE id > FLOOR(RANDOM() * 5000)
SELECT COUNT(*), AVG(id), MAX(id), MIN(id) FROM dos_test_table WHERE id > FLOOR(RANDOM() * 5000)
SELECT COUNT(*), AVG(id), MAX(id), MIN(id) FROM dos_test_table WHERE id > FLOOR(RANDOM() * 5000)
SELECT COUNT(*), AVG(id), MAX(id), MIN(id) FROM dos_test_table WHERE id > FLOOR(RANDOM() * 5000)
SELECT * FROM dos_test_table WHERE id = FLOOR(1 + RANDOMOM() * 10000) LIMIT 1
queries.query_description: HOUR 5 ANOMALY: 205000 rapid queries - 200x normal rate indicating Denial of Service attack

queries.query_string: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_records, MIN(id) as min_id, MAX(id) as max_id FROM dos_test_table
queries.query_description: Verify table statistics after DoS attack
